highlight_1.title: ai-powered
highlight_1.description: Our AI sees and hears what most might miss, saving you from expensive repairs

highlight_2.title: Fast Inspection
highlight_2.description: A complete 200+ point audit just under 90 mins, speeding up your buying decision.

highlight_3.title: Instant Report
highlight_3.description: Your detailed, easy-to-read report is ready the moment we're done.

highlight_4.title: 200+ Point Audit
highlight_4.description: A rigorous, unbiased protocol, ensuring consistent results you can trust.

highlight_5.title: Fraud Protection
highlight_5.description: We verify mileage and data to protect you from tampering and false claims.

highlight_6.title: Objective Image Data
highlight_6.description: AI scans photos for hidden repairs, giving you undeniable visual proof.

EnterpriseSolutions.heading: We power the industry, not just buyers.
EnterpriseSolutions.description: Join the network of insurers, banks, and dealerships using Wisedrive to prevent fraud, protect your car portfolio, and automate inspections.

WhyChooseUs.heading: what our ai does for you

slide_1.panel_text: Detects internal engine faults and wear that are inaudible to the human ear, preventing future breakdowns

slide_2.panel_text: Spots paint mismatches, hidden rust, and accident repairs that even you yourself might miss

slide_3.panel_text: Calculates the car's true market value based on its actual condition so you never overpay.

slide_4.panel_text: Delivers a clear 'Negotiate' or 'Walk Away' verdict, a total clarity for your biggest decision.

B2CHero.heading: Buying a used car?
B2CHero.description: You deserve to know exactly what you're buying. Wisedrive combines the power of AI technology and human expertise to inspect 200+ checkpoints on the vehicle. We give you an evidence-backed peace of mind so now you buy with full confidence and worry-free.

B2BHero.heading: Secure Your Automotive Portfolio with Verified Data
B2BHero.description: Whether you are an insurer managing risk, a financier securing collateral, or an OEM managing certified pre-owned inventory, the biggest variable is the asset itself. Wisedrive secures your portfolio with AI-augmented technical inspections, real-time ECU analysis, and fraud detection algorithms—integrated directly into your enterprise workflow.

Inspection.heading: The only inspection you'll ever need
Inspection.description: Our AI analyses over 200 inspection points so you know exactly what you're buying.
Inspection.checkbox_items_text: 200+ inspection checkpoints|Advanced OBD2 scanner test|Roadworthiness & safety evaluation|AI-generated diagnostics and repair indicators|Free consultation with inspection expert

Advantage.heading: Where Human Expertise Meets AI technology
Advantage.description: Our inspection is powered by the expertise of our professional inspectors backed by AI technology built from over one million data points. Together, Wisedrive gives you a report you can completely trust

FAQSection.heading: Got Questions about our inspection?
FAQSection.subtitle: Find answers to your questions about our AI-powered inspections and how we protect you from costly, hidden repairs.

HighlightPills.heading: Wisedrive is the new standard of trust & accuracy

Reviews.heading: Drive Away Happy
Reviews.description: Join thousands of satisfied customers who bought their vehicle with total peace of mind.

Steps.heading: Buy your car with total confidence
Steps.disclaimer_text: Steps may change for enterprise plans
Steps.subtitle_question: Have questions or ready to book
Steps.subtitle_heading: Send “Hi” to +60 12 255 9610 on WhatsApp. Our experts are ready to schedule your inspection or assist you with your purchase.

step_2.heading: 02. Schedule
step_2.description: Pick a time/place (home, dealer, seller’s location) via web or WhatsApp.

step_3.heading: 03. Inspection
step_3.description: Physical checks + OBD-II/ECM/BCM scans + photo-AI exterior review. We call out critical faults, repair estimates, and fair price guidance.

step_4.heading: 04. Report
step_4.description: Get a mobile-friendly link with photos, diagnostics, and next steps. Cars that pass get Wisedrive-Certified.

OurBrands.heading: Expertise Across Every Make
OurBrands.description: From Proton and Perodua to imports, we are trained for the cars you drive.
